Event 'DoRevokeAllow'

Sub 'AttributesSecurityCode'
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */
If Not (&STSMode = GAMSTSModes.ClientFull Or &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.ClientGetToken) &STSServerClientPassword.Visible = False STSServerClientPassword_Cell.Class = !'Invisible' Else &STSServerClientPassword.Visible = True STSServerClientPassword_Cell.Class = !'col-xs-12 DataContentCell' EndIf If Not (&ClientAllowRemoteAuth) &ClientRepositoryGUID.Visible = False ClientRepositoryGUID_Cell.Class = !'Invisible' Else &ClientRepositoryGUID.Visible = True ClientRepositoryGUID_Cell.Class = !'col-xs-12 DataContentCell' EndIf
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndSub
Event Enter
If &Mode <> TrnMode.Insert &Application.Load(&Id) Endif Do Case Case &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Insert or &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Update &Application.Name = &Name &Application.Description = &Dsc &Application.Version = &Version &Application.Copyright = &Copyright &Application.CompanyName = &Company &Application.UseAbsoluteUrlByEnvironment = &UseAbsoluteUrlByEnvironment &Application.HomeObject = &HomeObject &Application.AccountActivationObject = &AccountActivationObject &Application.LogoutObject = &LogoutObject &Application.MainMenuId = &MainMenu &Application.AccessRequiresPermission = &AccessRequiresPermission &Application.ClientAutoRegisterAnomymousUser = &AutoRegisterAnomymousUser &Application.ClientId = &ClientId &Application.ClientSecret = &ClientSecret &Application.ClientAccessUniqueByUser = &ClientAccessUniqueByUser &Application.ClientAllowRemoteAuthentication = &ClientAllowRemoteAuth &Application.ClientAllowGetUserRoles = &ClientAllowGetUserRoles &Application.ClientAllowGetUserAdditionalData = &ClientAllowGetUserAddData &Application.ClientAllowGetSessionInitialProperties = &ClientAllowGetSessionIniProp &Application.ClientLocalLoginURL = &ClientLocalLoginURL &Application.ClientCallbackURL = &ClientCallbackURL &Application.ClientCallbackURLisCustom = &ClientCallbackURLisCustom &Application.ClientCallbackURLStateName = &ClientCallbackURLStateName &Application.ClientImageURL = &ClientImageURL &Application.ClientAllowRemoteRestAuthentication = &ClientAllowRemoteRestAuth &Application.ClientAllowGetUserRolesRest = &ClientAllowGetUserRolesRest &Application.ClientAllowGetUserAdditionalDataRest = &ClientAllowGetUserAddDataRest &Application.ClientAllowGetSessionInitialPropertiesRest = &ClientAllowGetSessionIniPropRest &Application.ClientEncryptionKey = &ClientEncryptionKey &Application.ClientRepositoryGUID = &ClientRepositoryGUID &Application.SSORestEnable = &SSORestEnable &Application.SSORestMode = &SSORestMode &Application.SSORestUserAuthenticationTypeName = &SSORestUserAuthTypeName &Application.SSORestServerURL = &SSORestServerURL &Application.STSProtocolEnable = &STSProtocolEnable If not &STSAuthorizationUserName.IsEmpty() &GAMUser = &GAMUser.GetByLogin(!"local",&STSAuthorizationUserName,&UserErrors) &STSAuthorizationUserGUID = &GAMUser.GUID Endif &Application.STSAuthorizationUserGUID = &STSAuthorizationUserGUID &Application.STSMode = &STSMode &Application.STSServerURL = &STSServerURL &Application.STSServerClientPassword = &STSServerClientPassword &Application.STSServerRepositoryGUID = &STSServerRepositoryGUID &Application.Environment.Name = &EnvironmentName &Application.Environment.SecureProtocol = &EnvironmentSecureProtocol &Application.Environment.Host = &EnvironmentHost &Application.Environment.Port = &EnvironmentPort &Application.Environment.VirtualDirectory = &EnvironmentVirtualDirectory &Application.Environment.ProgramPackage = &EnvironmentProgramPackage &Application.Environment.ProgramExtension = &EnvironmentProgramExtension &Application.Save() Case &Mode = GAMAPiMode.Delete &Application.Delete() EndCase If &Application.Success() and &UserErrors.Count = 0 Commit GAMWWApplications() Else &Errors = &Application.GetErrors() Do 'Errors' EndIf
EndEvent
Event &ClientAllowRemoteAuth.Click
Do "UI_RemoteAuthenticationWeb"
EndEvent
Event &ClientAllowRemoteRestAuth.Click
Do "UI_RemoteAuthenticationRest"
EndEvent
Event &SSORestMode.Click
Do "UI_SSORest"
EndEvent
Event &STSProtocolEnable.Click
Do "UI_STSProtocol"
EndEvent
Event &STSMode.Click
Do Case Case &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.Server TableSTSServerCheckToken.Visible = True TableSTSClient.Visible = False Case &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.ClientGetToken TableSTSServerCheckToken.Visible = False TableSTSClient.Visible = True Case &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.ClientCheckToken TableSTSServerCheckToken.Visible = True TableSTSClient.Visible = True Case &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.ClientFull TableSTSServerCheckToken.Visible = True TableSTSClient.Visible = True EndCase Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndEvent
Event &SSORestEnable.Click
Do "UI_SSORest"
EndEvent
Sub 'Errors'
If &Errors.Count > 0 For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor EndIf If &UserErrors.Count > 0 For &Error in &UserErrors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor EndIf
EndSub
Sub "UI_RemoteAuthenticationWeb"
If &ClientAllowRemoteAuth TblWebAuth.Visible = True TblGeneralAuth.Visible = True Else TblWebAuth.Visible = False If not &ClientAllowRemoteRestAuth TblGeneralAuth.Visible = False Endif Endif
EndSub
Sub "UI_RemoteAuthenticationRest"
If &ClientAllowRemoteRestAuth TblRestAuth.Visible = True TblGeneralAuth.Visible = True Else TblRestAuth.Visible = False If not &ClientAllowRemoteAuth TblGeneralAuth.Visible = False Endif Endif
EndSub
Sub "UI_SSORest"
If &SSORestEnable TableSSORest.Visible = True Do Case Case &SSORestMode = GAMSSORestModes.Server TblSSORestModeClient.Visible = False Case &SSORestMode = GAMSSORestModes.Client TblSSORestModeClient.Visible = True EndCase Else TableSSORest.Visible = False Endif
EndSub
Sub "UI_STSProtocol"
If &STSProtocolEnable TableSTS.Visible = True Do Case Case &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.Server TableSTSServerCheckToken.Visible = True TableSTSClient.Visible = False Case &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.ClientGetToken TableSTSServerCheckToken.Visible = False TableSTSClient.Visible = True Case &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.ClientCheckToken TableSTSServerCheckToken.Visible = True TableSTSClient.Visible = True Case &STSMode = GAMSTSModes.ClientFull TableSTSServerCheckToken.Visible = True TableSTSClient.Visible = True EndCase Else TableSTS.Visible = False Endif Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndSub

Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.WeChat If &Mode = TrnMode.Update &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.Load(&Name) Endif &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.Name = &Name &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.IsEnable = &IsEnable &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.Description = &Dsc &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.SmallImageName = &SmallImageName &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.BigImageName = &BigImageName &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.Impersonate = &Impersonate &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.WeChat.ClientId = &ClientId &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.WeChat.ClientSecret = &ClientSecret &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.WeChat.VersionPath = &VersionPath &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.WeChat.SiteURL = &SiteURL &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.WeChat.AdditionalScope = &AdditionalScope &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.Save() EndCase
Case &Mode = TrnMode.Delete Do Case Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMLocal &AuthenticationTypeLocal.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeLocal.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Apple &AuthenticationTypeApple.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeApple.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Custom &AuthenticationTypeCustom.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeCustom.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.ExternalWebService &AuthenticationTypeWebService.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeWebService.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Facebook &AuthenticationTypeFacebook.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeFacebook.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemote &AuthenticationTypeGAMRemote.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeGAMRemote.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemoteRest &AuthenticationTypeGAMRemoteRest.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeGAMRemoteRest.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Google &AuthenticationTypeGoogle.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeGoogle.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Oauth20 &AuthenticationTypeOauth20.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeOauth20.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.OTP &AuthenticationTypeOTP.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeOTP.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Twitter &AuthenticationTypeTwitter.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeTwitter.Delete() Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.WeChat &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.Load(&Name) &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.Delete() EndCase EndCase
Do Case Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMLocal If &AuthenticationTypeLocal.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Apple If &AuthenticationTypeApple.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Custom If &AuthenticationTypeCustom.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.ExternalWebService If &AuthenticationTypeWebService.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Facebook If &AuthenticationTypeFacebook.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemote If &AuthenticationTypeGAMRemote.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemoteRest If &AuthenticationTypeGAMRemoteRest.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Google If &AuthenticationTypeGoogle.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Oauth20 If &AuthenticationTypeOauth20.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.OTP If &AuthenticationTypeOTP.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Twitter If &AuthenticationTypeTwitter.Success() Commit Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.WeChat If &AuthenticationTypeWeChat.Success() Commit Endif EndCase
&Errors = GAMRepository.GetLastErrors() If &Errors.Count = 0 GAMWWAuthTypes() Else For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor Endif EndIf EndEvent
Event &TFAEnable.Click
If &TFAEnable If &TFAFirstFactorAuthenticationExpiration.IsEmpty() &TFAFirstFactorAuthenticationExpiration = 900 Endif Do "GetListAuthenticationTypeOTP" Else &TFAAuthenticationTypeName.SetEmpty() Endif Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndEvent
Event &OTPGenerationType.Click
Do Case Case &OTPGenerationType = GAMOTPGenerationTypes.OTP_GAM TblTOTPAuthenticator.Visible = False Case &OTPGenerationType = GAMOTPGenerationTypes.OTP_Custom TblTOTPAuthenticator.Visible = False Do "GetEventListGenerateCode" // Case &OTPGenerationType = GAMOTPGenerationTypes.TOTP_Auth // TblTOTPAuthenticator.Visible = True // TblOTPCustom.Visible = False // TblTypeOTPGenerateCode.Visible = False Endcase Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndEvent
Sub "RefreshAuthenticationType"
&SiteURL.Visible = True TBLServerHost.Visible = False TblWebService.Visible = False TblExternal.Visible = False
TblOTPAuthentication.Visible = False TblTOTPAuthenticator.Visible = False TblOTPConfiguration.Visible = False
If &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Apple OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Facebook OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Google OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.OTP OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.WeChat OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Twitter &FunctionId = GAMAuthenticationFunctions.OnlyAuthentication &FunctionId.Enabled = False Else &FunctionId.Enabled = True Endif
Do Case Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMLocal Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Apple OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Facebook OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Google OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.WeChat OR &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemote If &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.WeChat &VersionPath.Visible = False Endif If &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemote &VersionPath.Visible = False TBLServerHost.Visible = True Endif Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemoteRest TBLServerHost.Visible = True
Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.OTP TblOTPAuthentication.Visible = True TblOTPConfiguration.Visible = True Do Case Case &OTPGenerationType = GAMOTPGenerationTypes.OTP_GAM TblTOTPAuthenticator.Visible = False Case &OTPGenerationType = GAMOTPGenerationTypes.OTP_Custom Do "GetEventListGenerateCode" // Case &OTPGenerationType = GAMOTPGenerationTypes.TOTP_Auth // TblTOTPAuthenticator.Visible = True // TblTypeOTPGenerateCode.Visible = False Endcase
Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Twitter &FunctionId = GAMAuthenticationFunctions.OnlyAuthentication &FunctionId.Enabled = False Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.ExternalWebService TblWebService.Visible = True Case &TypeId = GAMAuthenticationTypes.Custom TblExternal.Visible = True EndCase Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndSub
Sub "GetListAuthenticationTypeImpersonate"
For &AuthenticationType in GAMRepository.GetAuthenticationTypes(&GAMAuthenticationTypeFilter, &Errors) If &AuthenticationType.Name <> &Name AND &AuthenticationType.TypeId <> GAMAuthenticationTypes.OTP &Impersonate.AddItem(&AuthenticationType.Name, &AuthenticationType.Name) Endif Endfor
EndSub
Sub "GetListAuthenticationTypeOTP"
&GAMAuthenticationTypeFilter.Type = GAMAuthenticationTypes.OTP For &AuthenticationType in GAMRepository.GetAuthenticationTypes(&GAMAuthenticationTypeFilter, &Errors) &TFAAuthenticationTypeName.AddItem(&AuthenticationType.Name, &AuthenticationType.Description) Endfor
EndSub
Sub "GetEventListValidateUser"
&GAMEventSubscriptionFilter.Event = GAMEvents.User_OneTimePasswordValidateUser For &EventSuscription in GAMRepository.GetEventSubscriptions(&GAMEventSubscriptionFilter, &Errors) &OTPEventValidateUser.AddItem(&EventSuscription.Id, &EventSuscription.Description) Endfor
EndSub
Sub "GetEventListGenerateCode"
&GAMEventSubscriptionFilter.Event = GAMEvents.User_OneTimePasswordGenerateCode For &EventSuscription in GAMRepository.GetEventSubscriptions(&GAMEventSubscriptionFilter, &Errors) &OTPGenerationType_CustomEventGenerateCode.AddItem(&EventSuscription.Id, &EventSuscription.Description) Endfor
EndSub
Sub "GetEventListSendCode"
&GAMEventSubscriptionFilter.Event = GAMEvents.User_OneTimePasswordSendCode For &EventSuscription in GAMRepository.GetEventSubscriptions(&GAMEventSubscriptionFilter, &Errors) &OTPEventSendCode.AddItem(&EventSuscription.Id, &EventSuscription.Description) Endfor
EndSub
Sub "GetEventListValidateCode"
&GAMEventSubscriptionFilter.Event = GAMEvents.User_OneTimePasswordValidateCode For &EventSuscription in GAMRepository.GetEventSubscriptions(&GAMEventSubscriptionFilter, &Errors) &OTPEventValidateCode.AddItem(&EventSuscription.Id, &EventSuscription.Description) Endfor
EndSub
Sub "InitAuthenticationTypeApple"
Do "GetListAuthenticationTypeImpersonate" &FunctionId.Enabled = False &AuthenticationTypeApple.Load(&Name) &Name = &AuthenticationTypeApple.Name &IsEnable = &AuthenticationTypeApple.IsEnable &Dsc = &AuthenticationTypeApple.Description &SmallImageName = &AuthenticationTypeApple.SmallImageName &BigImageName = &AuthenticationTypeApple.BigImageName &Impersonate = &AuthenticationTypeApple.Impersonate &ClientId = &AuthenticationTypeApple.Apple.ClientId &ClientSecret = &AuthenticationTypeApple.Apple.ClientSecret &SiteURL = &AuthenticationTypeApple.Apple.SiteURL &AdditionalScope = &AuthenticationTypeApple.Apple.AdditionalScope

Event Start LayoutMainTable.Class = ThemeClass:MainContainer //Valid current connection &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.CheckConnection() If GeneXusSecurity.GAM.isMultitenant() Do 'isMultitenantInstallation' Else If not &isConnectionOK If GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetDefaultRepository(&RepositoryGUID) &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnectionByRepositoryGUID(&RepositoryGUID, &Errors) Else &ConnectionInfoCollection = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetConnections() If &ConnectionInfoCollection.Count > 0 //The first connection found is established by default &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnection(&ConnectionInfoCollection.Item(1).Name, &Errors) EndIf Endif Endif Endif &GAMApplication = GeneXusSecurity.GAMRepository.GetRemoteApplication(&IDP_State, &Errors) If not &GAMApplication.ClientImageURL.IsEmpty() &LogoAppClient.Visible = True TBAppName.Visible = False &LogoAppClient.FromURL(&GAMApplication.ClientImageURL) Else &LogoAppClient.Visible = False TBAppName.Visible = True TBAppName.Caption = &GAMApplication.Name Endif

Event Enter
//Set Remember User type Do Case Case &KeepMeLoggedIn &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.Authentication Case &RememberMe &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.Login Otherwise &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.None EndCase
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Read initial properties sent by the CLIENT (optional) /// &GAMProperties = GAMRepository.GetGAMRemoteInitialProperties(&IDP_State) &AdditionalParameter.Properties = &GAMProperties //You can here add more properties to the collection, these //are saved in the session when the user authenticates ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
&AdditionalParameter.AuthenticationTypeName = &LogOnTo &AdditionalParameter.IDPState = &IDP_State &AdditionalParameter.OTPStep = 1 // Login User &LoginOK = GAMRepository.Login(&UserName, &UserPassword, &AdditionalParameter, &Errors ) If &LoginOK //Login OK! Else If &Errors.Count > 0 Do Case Case (&Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordExpired OR &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordMustBeChanged) //Webpanel to Change Password GAMChangePassword(&IDP_State) Case &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMissingRequiredData //Webpanel to Complete User data GAMUpdateRegisterUser(&IDP_State) Case &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserAccessCodeSent OR &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMustValidateSecondFactorToFinishAuthentication //Webpanel to validate access code GAMOTPAuthentication(&IDP_State) Otherwise &UserPassword.SetEmpty() Do 'DisplayMessages' EndCase EndIf Endif

/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent

EndSub
Event Refresh
TableLoginError.Visible = false //Gets last error in the GAM &isRedirect = False &ErrorsLogin = GAMRepository.GetLastErrors() If &ErrorsLogin.Count > 0 Do Case Case &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.ConnectionNotSpecified OR &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMustBeAuthenticated //DO NOT display these messages Case (&ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordExpired OR &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordMustBeChanged) //Webpanel to Change Password GAMChangePassword(&IDP_State) &isRedirect = True Case &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMissingRequiredData //Webpanel to Complete User data GAMUpdateRegisterUser(&IDP_State) &isRedirect = True Otherwise &UserPassword = "" &Errors = &ErrorsLogin Do 'DisplayMessages' TableLogin.Visible = False EndCase Endif
If not &isRedirect //Gets last error in GAM &SessionValid = GAMSession.IsValid(&Session, &Errors)
If &SessionValid and not &Session.IsAnonymous If GAMRepository.IsRemoteAuthentication(&IDP_State) //Redirect to remote authentication GAMRepository.RedirectToRemoteAuthentication(&IDP_State) Else &URL = GAMRepository.GetLastErrorsURL() If &URL.IsEmpty() GAMApplication.GoHome() Else Link(&URL) Endif Endif Else // List Log on to &LogOnTo.Clear() &AuthenticationTypes = GAMRepository.GetEnabledAuthenticationTypes(&Language, &Errors) For &AuthenticationType in &AuthenticationTypes If &AuthenticationType.NeedUserName //Authentication types you must enter the username in this web panel &LogOnTo.AddItem(&AuthenticationType.Name,&AuthenticationType.Description) EndIf EndFor If &LogOnTo.Count <= 1 &LogOnTo.Visible = False Endif
//Initialize variables if the user chooses to keep that information &isOK = GAMRepository.GetRememberLogin(&LogOnTo, &UserName, &UserRememberMe, &Errors) If &UserRememberMe = GAMRememberUserTypes.Login &RememberMe = True Endif
// Select Default Authentication Type, Display Remember User if it is enabled on Repository &Repository = GAMRepository.Get() If &LogOnTo.Count > 1 &LogOnTo = &Repository.DefaultAuthenticationTypeName Endif Do Case Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Login &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False &RememberMe.Visible = True Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Authentication &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True &RememberMe.Visible = False Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Both &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True &RememberMe.Visible = True Otherwise &RememberMe.Visible = False &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False EndCase EndIf Endif
EndEvent
Event &LogOnTo.Click
&AuthenticationTypes = GAMRepository.GetEnabledAuthenticationTypes(&Language, &Errors) &isModeOTP = False For &AuthenticationType in &AuthenticationTypes If &AuthenticationType.Name = &LogOnTo Do "ValidLOgOnToOTP" Exit Endif EndFor If &isModeOTP = False &UserPassword.Visible = True &UserPassword.InviteMessage = "Password" BtnEnter.Caption = "WWP_GAM_Login" TBForgotPwd.Visible = True &Repository = GAMRepository.Get() Do 'DisplayCheckBox' Endif
EndEvent
Event 'ForgotPassword'
GAMRecoverPasswordStep1.Link(&IDP_State)
EndEvent
Sub 'isMultitenantInstallation'
//Read Curent Repository &GAMRepository = GeneXusSecurity.GAMRepository.Get() //Check if the current repository uses an authentication master repository If not &GAMRepository.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId.IsEmpty() &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnectionByRepositoryId(&GAMRepository.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId, &Errors) Endif If not &isConnectionOK If GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetDefaultRepository(&RepositoryGUID) &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnectionByRepositoryGUID(&RepositoryGUID, &Errors) Else &ConnectionInfoCollection = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetConnections() If &ConnectionInfoCollection.Count > 0 //The first connection found is established by default &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnection(&ConnectionInfoCollection.Item(1).Name, &Errors) EndIf Endif Endif
If &isConnectionOK &GAMRepository = GeneXusSecurity.GAMRepository.Get() //Check if the current repository uses an authentication master repository If not &GAMRepository.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId.IsEmpty() &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnectionByRepositoryId(&GAMRepository.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId, &Errors) &GAMRepository = GeneXusSecurity.GAMRepository.Get() Endif Endif
EndSub
Sub 'DisplayCheckBox'
Do Case Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Login &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False &RememberMe.Visible = True Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Authentication &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True &RememberMe.Visible = False Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Both &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True &RememberMe.Visible = True Otherwise &RememberMe.Visible = False &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False EndCase
EndSub
Sub "ValidLOgOnToOTP"
If not &AuthenticationType.NeedUserPassword &isModeOTP = True &UserPassword.Visible = False BtnEnter.Caption = "WWP_GAM_SendMeCode" &RememberMe.Visible = False &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False TBForgotPwd.Visible = False EndIf
EndSub
Sub 'DisplayMessages'
TableLoginError.Visible = False For &Error in &Errors If &Error.Code <> GAMErrorMessages.SessionExpired Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) Endif EndFor
EndSub

Event Enter
&Repository.Load(&Id) &isOK = True If &Mode = TrnMode.Insert // Validate passwords If &AdministratorUserPassword.Trim() <> &ConfAdministratorUserPassword.Trim() Msg("WWP_GAM_AdminPasswordConfNotMatch") &isOK = False EndIf If &ConnectionUserPassword.Trim() <> &ConfConnectionUserPassword.Trim() Msg("WWP_GAM_ConnectionPasswordConfNotMatch") &isOK = False EndIf EndIf If &isOK Do Case Case &Mode = TrnMode.Insert &GUID = GUID.NewGuid().ToString() &RepositoryCreate.GUID = &GUID &RepositoryCreate.Name = &Name &RepositoryCreate.NameSpace = &NameSpace &RepositoryCreate.Description = &Description &RepositoryCreate.AdministratorUserName = &AdministratorUserName &RepositoryCreate.AdministratorUserPassword = &AdministratorUserPassword &RepositoryCreate.AllowOauthAccess = &AllowOauthAccess &RepositoryCreate.ConnectionUserName = &ConnectionUserName &RepositoryCreate.ConnectionUserPassword = &ConnectionUserPassword &RepositoryCreate.GenerateSessionStatistics = &GenerateSessionStatistics &RepositoryCreate.GiveAnonymousSession = True &RepositoryCreate.AllowOauthAccess = True
If &UseCurrentRepositorAsMasterAuthentication &GAMRepository = GAMRepository.Get() &RepositoryCreate.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId = &GAMRepository.Id &RepositoryCreate.AuthenticationMasterAuthTypeName = &AuthenticationMasterAuthTypeName Endif
&RepositoryCreate.CreateGAMApplication = &CreateGAMApplication
If not &CopyFromRepositoryId.IsEmpty() &RepositoryCreate.CopyFromRepositoryId = &CopyFromRepositoryId If &CopyRoles &RepositoryCreate.CopyRoles = &CopyRoles &RepositoryCreate.AdministratorRoleId = &AdministratorRoleId EndIf &RepositoryCreate.CopySecurityPolicies = &CopySecurityPolicies Endif
If &CopyApplication and not &CopyFromApplicationId.IsEmpty() &RepositoryCreate.CopyApplication = &CopyApplication &RepositoryCreate.CopyFromApplicationId = &CopyFromApplicationId &RepositoryCreate.CopyApplicationRolePermissions= &CopyApplicationRolePermissions Endif &isOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.CreateRepository(&RepositoryCreate, &UpdateConnectionFile, &Errors) If &isOK Commit If &isGAMAdminAccessRepository //Enable the gamadmin user to access the new repository &RepositoryNew = GAMRepository.GetByGUID(&GUID, &Errors) &GAMUser = GAMUser.Get() &isOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.RepositoryUserEnable(&RepositoryNew.Id, &GAMUser, &AdministratorRoleId, &Errors) If &isOK Commit Endif Endif Endif
Case &Mode = TrnMode.Delete &isOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.DeleteRepository(&Repository.GUID, &Errors) If &isOK Commit Endif EndCase EndIf If &isOK Return Else Do 'DisplayErrors' Endif
EndEvent
Event &UseCurrentRepositorAsMasterAuthentication.Click
&GAMRepository = GAMRepository.Get() &NameSpace = &GAMRepository.NameSpace If &UseCurrentRepositorAsMasterAuthentication &NameSpace.Visible = False &AdministratorUserName.Caption = "WWP_GAM_AdministratorUserNameUserExistCurrentTenant" &AdministratorUserPassword.SetEmpty() &AdministratorUserPassword.Visible = False &ConfAdministratorUserPassword.SetEmpty() &ConfAdministratorUserPassword.Visible = False Else &NameSpace.Visible = True &AdministratorUserName.Caption = "WWP_GAM_AdministratorUserName" &AdministratorUserPassword.Visible = True &ConfAdministratorUserPassword.Visible = True Endif Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndEvent
Event &CopyApplicationRolePermissions.Click
If &CopyApplicationRolePermissions &CopyRoles = True &CopyApplication = True EndIf Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndEvent
Event &CopyRoles.Click
If Not &CopyRoles &CopyApplicationRolePermissions = False &CopyApplication = False EndIf Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndEvent
Event &CopyApplication.Click
If Not &CopyApplication &CopyApplicationRolePermissions = False &CopyRoles = False EndIf Do 'AttributesSecurityCode'
EndEvent
Sub 'DisplayErrors'
For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor
EndSub

Do not change */ EndSub Sub 'LoadRegFiltersState' /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ For &GridStateFilterValue in &GridState.FilterValues Do Case Case &GridStateFilterValue.Name = !"SEARCH" &Search.FromString(&GridStateFilterValue.Value) Case &GridStateFilterValue.Name = !"FILUSERGENDER" &FilUserGender.FromString(&GridStateFilterValue.Value) Case &GridStateFilterValue.Name = !"FILAUTTYPE" &FilAutType.FromString(&GridStateFilterValue.Value) Case &GridStateFilterValue.Name = !"FILROL" &FilRol.FromString(&GridStateFilterValue.Value) EndCase EndFor /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */ EndSub Sub 'SaveGridState' /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */ &GridState.FromXml(&Session.Get(&PgmName + !"GridState")) // Save grid state in session. &GridState.FilterValues.Clear() WWP_GridStateAddFilterValue(&GridState, !"SEARCH", "WWP_GAM_Search", not &Search.IsEmpty(), 0, &Search, '') WWP_GridStateAddFilterValue(&GridState, !"FILUSERGENDER", "WWP_GAM_Gender", not &FilUserGender.IsEmpty(), 0, &FilUserGender, '') WWP_GridStateAddFilterValue(&GridState, !"FILAUTTYPE", "WWP_GAM_Authentication", not &FilAutType.IsEmpty(), 0, &FilAutType, '') WWP_GridStateAddFilterValue(&GridState, !"FILROL", "WWP_GAM_Role", not &FilRol.IsEmpty(), 0, &FilRol.ToString().Trim(), '') &GridState.PageSize = str(Grid.Rows) &GridState.CurrentPage = Grid.CurrentPage SaveGridState.Call(&PgmName + !"GridState", &GridState.ToXml()) /* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */ EndSub Event &BtnUnblockOTPCodes.Click &User.Load(&GUID) If &User.UnblockOTPCodes(&Errors) Commit Msg("WWP_GAM_UserSuccessfullyUnlockOTPCodes") Else For &Error in &Errors Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) EndFor Endif EndEvent

Event Start
LayoutMainTable.Class = ThemeClass:MainContainer RegisterUser.Link = GAMRegisterUser.Link() CurrentRepository.Visible = False TableButtons.Visible = False
//Valid current connection &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.CheckConnection() If GeneXusSecurity.GAM.isMultitenant() Do 'isMultitenantInstallation' Else If not &isConnectionOK If GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetDefaultRepository(&RepositoryGUID) &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnectionByRepositoryGUID(&RepositoryGUID, &Errors) Else &ConnectionInfoCollection = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetConnections() If &ConnectionInfoCollection.Count > 0 //The first connection found is established by default &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnection(&ConnectionInfoCollection.Item(1).Name, &Errors) EndIf Endif Endif Endif
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */
Do 'AttributesSecurityCode' &URL.Visible = False &TypeAuthType.Visible = False &NameAuthType.Visible = False
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event GridAuthTypes.Load
For &AuthenticationType in &AuthenticationTypes If not &AuthenticationType.NeedUserName //is an Identity Provider tableloginerror.Visible =true If not &AuthenticationType.SmallImageName.IsEmpty() &ImageAuthType.FromImage(&AuthenticationType.SmallImageName) Else &ImageAuthType.FromImage(GAMButtonGAMRemoteSmall) Endif &TypeAuthType = &AuthenticationType.Type &NameAuthType = &AuthenticationType.Name.Trim() &ImageAuthType.TooltipText = Format("Sign in with %1", &AuthenticationType.Description.Trim() ) If TableButtons.Visible = False TableButtons.Visible = True EndIf Load EndIf EndFor
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */
//this code should be inside the For Each used to load the grid
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Event Enter
//Set Remember User type Do Case Case &KeepMeLoggedIn &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.Authentication Case &RememberMe &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.Login Otherwise &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.None EndCase
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Send Custom Properties (optional) //////////////////////// //&CustomGAMProperty = new() //&CustomGAMProperty.Id = "Company" //&CustomGAMProperty.Value = "UY" //&AdditionalParameter.Properties.Add(&CustomGAMProperty) //These properties are saved in the session when the user authenticates ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
&AdditionalParameter.AuthenticationTypeName = &LogOnTo &AdditionalParameter.OTPStep = 1 &LoginOK = GAMRepository.Login(&UserName, &UserPassword, &AdditionalParameter, &Errors ) If &LoginOK &URL = GAMRepository.GetLastErrorsURL() If &URL.IsEmpty() GAMHome() Else Link(&URL) Endif Else If &Errors.Count > 0 Do Case Case (&Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordExpired OR &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordMustBeChanged) //Webpanel to Change Password GAMChangePassword(&IDP_State) Case &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMissingRequiredData //Webpanel to Complete User data GAMUpdateRegisterUser(&IDP_State) Case &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserAccessCodeSent OR &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMustValidateSecondFactorToFinishAuthentication //Webpanel to validate access code GAMOTPAuthentication(&IDP_State) Otherwise &UserPassword.SetEmpty() Do 'DisplayMessages' EndCase EndIf Endif
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndEvent
Sub 'AttributesSecurityCode'
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [Start] - Do not change */
If Not (&LogOnTo.Count > 1) &LogOnTo.Visible = False LogOnTo_Cell.Class = !'Invisible' Else &LogOnTo.Visible = True LogOnTo_Cell.Class = !'col-xs-12 DataContentCellLogin CellPaddingLogin' EndIf If Not (1=1) &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False KeepMeLoggedIn_Cell.Class = !'Invisible' Else &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True KeepMeLoggedIn_Cell.Class = !'col-xs-12 DataContentCellLogin' EndIf If Not (1=1) &RememberMe.Visible = False RememberMe_Cell.Class = !'Invisible' Else &RememberMe.Visible = True RememberMe_Cell.Class = !'col-xs-12 DataContentCellLogin' EndIf
TableButtons.Visible = (GAMRepository.CanAuthenticateWith(GAMAuthenticationTypes.Facebook) Or GAMRepository.CanAuthenticateWith(GAMAuthenticationTypes.Twitter) Or GAMRepository.CanAuthenticateWith(GAMAuthenticationTypes.Google) Or GAMRepository.CanAuthenticateWith(GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemote))
/* Generated by DVelop Work With Plus Pattern [End] - Do not change */
EndSub
Event Refresh
TableLoginError.Visible = false &isRedirect = False
//Gets last error in the GAM &ErrorsLogin = GAMRepository.GetLastErrors() If &ErrorsLogin.Count > 0 Do Case Case &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.ConnectionNotSpecified OR &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMustBeAuthenticated //DO NOT display these messages Otherwise &UserPassword.SetEmpty() &Errors = &ErrorsLogin Do 'DisplayMessages' EndCase Endif
If not &isRedirect //Gets last error in GAM &SessionValid = GAMSession.IsValid(&Session, &Errors)
If &SessionValid and not &Session.IsAnonymous &URL = GAMRepository.GetLastErrorsURL() If &URL.IsEmpty() &GAMApplicationCollection = GAMRepository.GetApplications(&GAMApplicationFilter,&Errors) For &GAMApplication in &GAMApplicationCollection If &GAMApplication.GUID <> GAMInternalGUIDs.AppGAMUserBackend Exit Endif EndFor &GAMApplication = &GAMApplication.Get() If &GAMApplication.HomeObject <> '' GAMRepository.ApplicationGoHome(&GAMApplication.GUID) Else Home.Link() Endif Else Link(&URL) Endif Else //List Log on to &LogOnTo.Clear() &AuthenticationTypes = GAMRepository.GetEnabledAuthenticationTypes(&Language, &Errors) For &AuthenticationType in &AuthenticationTypes If &AuthenticationType.NeedUserName //Authentication types you must enter the username in this web panel &LogOnTo.AddItem(&AuthenticationType.Name, &AuthenticationType.Description) Else GridAuthTypes.Visible = True EndIf EndFor If &LogOnTo.Count <= 1 &LogOnTo.Visible = False Else &LogOnTo = &AuthenticationTypes.Item(1).Name Endif
//Initialize variables if the user chooses to keep that information &isOK = GAMRepository.GetRememberLogin(&LogOnTo, &AuxUserName, &UserRememberMe, &Errors) If not &AuxUserName.IsEmpty() &UserName = &AuxUserName Endif If &UserRememberMe = GAMRememberUserTypes.Login &RememberMe = True Endif
//Select Default Authentication Type, Display Remember User if it is enabled on Repository &Repository = GAMRepository.Get() If &LogOnTo.Count > 1 &LogOnTo = &Repository.DefaultAuthenticationTypeName Endif Do 'DisplayCheckBox' For &AuthenticationType in &AuthenticationTypes If &AuthenticationType.Name = &LogOnTo Do "ValidLOgOnToOTP" Exit Endif EndFor
EndIf Endif
EndEvent
Event &ImageAuthType.Click
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Send properties to GAM Identity Provider (optional) ////// // &CustomGAMProperty = new() // &CustomGAMProperty.Id = "language" // &CustomGAMProperty.Value = "en" // &AdditionalParameter.Properties.Add(&CustomGAMProperty) ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
&AdditionalParameter.AuthenticationTypeName = &NameAuthType &LoginOK = GAMRepository.Login(&UserName, &UserPassword, &AdditionalParameter, &Errors )
EndEvent
Event &LogOnTo.Click
&AuthenticationTypes = GAMRepository.GetEnabledAuthenticationTypes(&Language, &Errors) &isModeOTP = False For &AuthenticationType in &AuthenticationTypes If &AuthenticationType.Name = &LogOnTo Do "ValidLOgOnToOTP" Exit Endif EndFor If &isModeOTP = False &UserPassword.Visible = True &UserPassword.InviteMessage = "WWP_GAM_Password" BtnEnter.Caption = "WWP_GAM_SignIn" ForgotPassword.Visible = True &Repository = GAMRepository.Get() Do 'DisplayCheckBox' Endif
EndEvent
Event ForgotPassword.Click
GAMRecoverPasswordStep1(&IDP_State)
EndEvent
Event 'SelectAuthenticationType'
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Send properties to GAM Identity Provider (optional) ////// // &CustomGAMProperty = new() // &CustomGAMProperty.Id = "language" // &CustomGAMProperty.Value = "en" // &AdditionalParameter.Properties.Add(&CustomGAMProperty) ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
&AdditionalParameter.AuthenticationTypeName = &NameAuthType &LoginOK = GAMRepository.Login(&UserName, &UserPassword, &AdditionalParameter, &Errors )
EndEvent
Sub 'isMultitenantInstallation'
//Read Curent Repository &GAMRepository = GeneXusSecurity.GAMRepository.Get() //Check if the current repository uses an authentication master repository If not &GAMRepository.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId.IsEmpty() &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnectionByRepositoryId(&GAMRepository.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId, &Errors) Endif If not &isConnectionOK If GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetDefaultRepository(&RepositoryGUID) &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnectionByRepositoryGUID(&RepositoryGUID, &Errors) Else &ConnectionInfoCollection = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetConnections() If &ConnectionInfoCollection.Count > 0 //The first connection found is established by default &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnection(&ConnectionInfoCollection.Item(1).Name, &Errors) EndIf Endif Endif
If &isConnectionOK &GAMRepository = GeneXusSecurity.GAMRepository.Get() //Check if the current repository uses an authentication master repository If not &GAMRepository.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId.IsEmpty() &isConnectionOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetConnectionByRepositoryId(&GAMRepository.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId, &Errors) &GAMRepository = GeneXusSecurity.GAMRepository.Get() Endif CurrentRepository.Caption = "Repository: " + &GAMRepository.Name CurrentRepository.Visible = True Endif
EndSub
Sub 'DisplayCheckBox'
Do Case Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Login &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False &RememberMe.Visible = True Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Authentication &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True &RememberMe.Visible = False Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Both &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True &RememberMe.Visible = True Otherwise &RememberMe.Visible = False &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False EndCase
EndSub
Sub "ValidLOgOnToOTP"
If not &AuthenticationType.NeedUserPassword &isModeOTP = True &UserPassword.Visible = False BtnEnter.Caption = "WWP_GAM_SendMeCode" &RememberMe.Visible = False &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False ForgotPassword.Visible = False EndIf
EndSub
Sub 'DisplayMessages'
TableLoginError.Visible = True For &Error in &Errors If &Error.Code <> GAMErrorMessages.SessionExpired Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) Endif EndFor
EndSub

Event Start
For &GAMAPIVersion in GAMVersion.Elements() Exit EndFor &isOk = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetDataBaseVersion(&GAMDatabaseVersion) &isOk = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetEnableTracing(&EnableTracing) &isOk = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetDefaultRepository(&DefaultRepository) &isOk = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetRegularExpressionToValidateEmail(&EmailRegularExpression)
&isAdminGAM = GAMRepository.IsGAMAdministrator(&Errors)
&DefaultRepository.Clear() If not &DefaultRepository.IsEmpty() OR GeneXusSecurity.GAM.isMultitenant() If &isAdminGAM &DefaultRepository.AddItem(!"", !"(none)") Endif &LoadDefaultOK = False &GAMRepositoryCollection = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.GetAllRepositories(&Filter, &Errors) If &GAMRepositoryCollection.Count > 0 For &GAMRepositoryItem in &GAMRepositoryCollection If &GAMRepositoryItem.AuthenticationMasterRepositoryId.IsEmpty() If &GAMRepositoryItem.GUID = &DefaultRepository &LoadDefaultOK = True Endif &DefaultRepository.AddItem(&GAMRepositoryItem.GUID, &GAMRepositoryItem.Name) Endif Endfor Endif If not &LoadDefaultOK AND not &DefaultRepository.IsEmpty() &DefaultRepository.Clear() &DefaultRepository.AddItem(&DefaultRepository, &DefaultRepository) Endif Endif

&isOk = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetEnableTracing(&EnableTracing) If &isOK &GAMRepository = GAMRepository.Get() If GAMRepository.IsGAMAdministrator(&Errors) &isOk = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetRegularExpressionToValidateEmail(&EmailRegularExpression) &isOK = GeneXusSecurity.GAM.SetDefaultRepository(&DefaultRepository) If &isOk Msg(GetMessageText("GXM_sucupdated")) Else Msg(!"Default repository could not be saved") Endif Else Msg(GetMessageText("GXM_sucupdated")) Endif Else Msg(!"Tracing status could not be saved") Endif
